document.full_text: the grand bazaar, built in 1461, has its own post office, mosque and police station. but it needs structural repairs and there is no one in charge to do it.
document.title: fighting entropy to salvage istanbul's historic bazaar
lines_and_colors: the grand bazaar, built in 1461, has its own post office, mosque and police station. but it needs structural repairs and there is no one in charge to do it.
